metadata.title: Fatal Varicella Myocarditis in a Child with Down Syndrome-A Case Report

abstract.original_text: A 12-year-old male child with Down syndrome, who had recovered from congenital heart disease, succumbed to severe varicella myocarditis. His clinical presentation at admission mimicked acute coronary syndrome. Analysis of this case throws insight into several aspects of varicella myocarditis.
